name: Laptop
description: ASUS TUF F17 Gaming Laptop - 17.3” 2K QHD 240Hz Display, Intel i7-13620H(up to 4.9 GHz), 64GB DDR5, 1TB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070, Wi-Fi 6, RGB Backlit Keyboard, Windows 11 Pro, MS Office Pro

caracteristics.Special Feature: HD Audio, Spill resistant, High Definition Audio, TrackPoint, Anti Glare Coating

aboutThisItem: Powerful Performance: The ASUS TUF F17 Gaming Laptop features an Intel i7-13620H processor, with a turbo frequency of up to 4.9 GHz, ensuring seamless gaming and multitasking experiences for the most demanding users.

Immersive Display: Enjoy stunning visuals on the 17.3” 2K QHD display with a 240Hz refresh rate, providing ultra-smooth gameplay and vibrant colors, making this ASUS TUF 17 gaming laptop perfect for gamers seeking exceptional graphics.

Next-Gen Graphics: Equipped with the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 GPU and 12GB GDDR6 video memory, this RTX 4070 gaming laptop delivers high-performance graphics and supports advanced gaming technologies like ray tracing for an immersive gaming experience.

Enhanced Storage and Memory: With an impressive 64GB DDR5 RAM and a massive 4TB SSD, the ASUS TUF F17 ensures rapid loading times and ample storage for games, applications, and media, catering to serious gamers and content creators alike.

Versatile Connectivity and Features: This gaming laptop includes Wi-Fi 6 for fast internet connectivity, multiple USB ports, and an RGB backlit keyboard, providing gamers with essential tools and aesthetics for an optimal gaming setup.
